lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward and giving a hand up, especially by supporting and empowering women.  I love Kiva and all they do.  It's a good feeling to loan and see what big things these women can accomplish to help support their families.  I greatly respect their hard work and entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm fortunate to be able to stay home with my two small children.  I am also a hobby sewer (with big dreams) and a small shop on Etsy.

lenders.name: Rayna
lenders.loan_because: I started my own small business in 2004 and know how difficult it can be to find the resources to be successful. I was fortunate to have a support network and I want to help others the way I was helped.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and I also copy edit/proofread books that other people write to be sure the information is error free before the books are published.

lenders.loan_because: I like to share my blessings with others

lenders.loan_because:
“Whether one is rich or poor, educated or illiterate, religious or nonbelieving, man or woman, black, white, or brown, we are all the same....We all share basic needs for food, shelter, safety, and love. We all aspire to happiness and we all shun suffering....On this fundamental level, religion, ethnicity, culture, and language make no difference.”
-  Dalai Lama XIV, Toward a True Kinship of Faiths: How the World’s Religions Can Come Together
lenders.occupational_info: I teach courses, advise students, and supervise research at a small college.

lenders.occupational_info: Public Service

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I tend to look for loans that are bicycle related because I think the world needs more bikes not more cars.  I have had many hands up in my life and just want to "pay it forward"!
lenders.occupational_info: Family doctor in Thunder Bay  Also involved with Bicycles for Humanity. Check out www.bicycles-for-humanity.org

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Even though I am a student and I don't have a lot of money, I realize the money I DO have is more than some people see in a lifetime... so instead of sitting on my money because I might need it someday, I want to give to people that can use it now.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Kind people have helped me in the past and if I can make someone else's life a little easier and brighter then that is good enough for me!

lenders.name: St. Paul

Director of a translation/SEO agency, we perform professional translation and develop internet marketing campaigns and SEO agency support in 20 languages. We tend to supply our services to other agencies that are in need of reliable multilingual translation, copywriting or international SEO skills.

If you're looking for high quality translation or content for your website, a clients website, brochures, marketing materials - we provide a 100% satisfaction and fast delivery.

If just one person believes in you. 
Deep enough, and strong enough,
believes in you hard enough,and long enough before you knew it, someone else would think, if he can do it, I can do it. Making it..
...
More, and more. And when all those people believe in you,
deep enough and strong enough believe in you, hard enough and long enough it stands to reason you, yourself will start to see what everybody sees in you.
And maybe even you, can believe in you, too.
lenders.occupational_info: The master of the art of living makes little distinction between his work and his play, his labor and his leisure, his mind and his body, his information and his recreation, his love and his religion. He hardly knows which is which. He simply pursues his vision of excellence at whatever he does, leaving others to decide whether he is working or playing. To him, he’s always doing both.

lenders.name: FBC Microfinance Group
lenders.loan_because: In his first sermon, Jesus said: "The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to preach good news to the poor.  He has sent me to proclaim freedom for the prisoners and recovery of sight for the blind, to release the oppressed, to proclaim the year of the Lord's favor."  (Luke 4:18-19) This message leads us to have compassion for the poor, not just in terms of charity, but to help them lift themselves up.  We strongly support Kiva's work in helping entrepreneurs in less-developed countries start, maintain and grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We are members of the First Baptist Church in the city of Washington DC.  Our church's mission is to love God and love one another.  All are welcome at our church.

lenders.loan_because: Being from Africa, I know firsthand what impact a small loan can have on an individual. Like they say, you are known not by what you do, but by what impact you make on others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the people business, personal banker/advisor. I have a heart for people and intend on doing what I can to leave my  mark on the world.

lenders.name: Cinty & Aris
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lenders.name: Priscilla
lenders.loan_because: I have faith in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on websites.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: terry
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired grandmother of 5 ages 11 to 6 and very blessed.

lenders.name: sandi
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the only way people in this large world will eventually learn to trust and love one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist the pharmacists in a retail pharmacy by counting and pouring medications, input of prescriptions in the computer and customer service.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is  the best way I know of to help those in need help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a commercial & industrial roofing and sheet-metal company. I also own a sheet-metal business pecializing in copper products

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I know what its like to be broke. It's the right thing to do to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their problems with our products.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: It makes Ramona happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fishery hydrologist, I enhance and preserve fish species.

lenders.name: Temple Israel of West Palm Beach
Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: "give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."
lenders.occupational_info: economic development

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.occupational_info: I colour-code my spreadsheets. I play volleyball competitively. I have travelled alone to nine countries.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.occupational_info: I work to ensure that every kid has an opportunity to get an outstanding education.

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because: I care, I'm willing to help

lenders.name: John & Dixie
lenders.loan_because: I know from years past that a "hand up" is not a "hand out".  There were times in my past that I nneded that same help.  Those days are behind me and I am in a position to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I started a small business installing glass windows in cars, buildings and houses.  The business grew to 6-7 employees, and after 20 years I sold out due to my health and retired.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: basic finance still holds water.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a Kiva Fellow serving at Soro Yiriwaso, Kiva's first and only field partner in Mali!

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 5:42 'Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.'
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small town in the western highlands of Guatemala, using marketing and business practices to increase incomes of farmers

lenders.name: Yuya
lenders.loan_because:
I want you to be happy !!
That is also my happyness !!

lenders.name: Art
lenders.loan_because: It's NOT okay that people in some parts of the world live better because people in other parts of the world live worse.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a pizza delivery driver.

lenders.name: Erich
lenders.occupational_info: I look for errors in computer programs. I write a list of errors, and the errors must be fixed before the program is sold.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others achieve a sustainable living.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm starting a non-profit to build schools in majority-world countries.  I believe education is the key to ending poverty.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: It is at the core of my Jewish belief system to help the less fortunate.

lenders.name: Anne & Bill
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the image of Americans in the world.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: the Lord says we are to carry each other's burdens.

lenders.name: Kevin and Andrine
lenders.loan_because: Other people helped us to be successful.  We want to show our gratefulness to them by now helping others.  We may like bugs, but we love people more.
lenders.occupational_info: We are Entomologists, that is scientists who study insects.  We conduct research on pests of grains, and do educational outreach to introduce children to biological science.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help other people grow their businesses

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I am glad to have found this way of helping another hard working person by letting them know that someone cares.
lenders.occupational_info: I work several hours a week editing Kiva loans, and I also do housekeeping and yard work as suits a 70-year-old retiree.

lenders.name: Jose I
lenders.loan_because:
I share my money. They share their dreams.

Yo comparto mi dinero. Ellos comparten sus sueños.

lenders.name: Adii
lenders.loan_because: As a young entrepeneur I always struggled to finance my business ideas and thus know that every bit I can give will help another upcoming entrepeneur in their quest for financial security & freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a business owner and primarily work online.

lenders.name: Jacob & Roslyn
lenders.loan_because: We are pleased to help people improve their quality of life and assist them to become more independent and to better support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We are elderly and retired now. Jacob used to teach for many years, Roslyn did office work and was a sales clerk as well as a homemaker.

lenders.name: abduljelil
lenders.occupational_info: very interesting

lenders.name: cheryl
lenders.loan_because: Because I am able to and others can use a hand up not hand outs
lenders.occupational_info: Retired but I used to own a bakery/catering business

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who want to help themselves. Everyone should have the opportunity to prosper. I am not able to lend much because I am also struggling to make ends meet. I hope that the little I can do makes a difference in someone's life!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and a mother. I take care of my two children and I am going to school to become a teacher. In the evenings, I help foreign families learn English.

lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending finances small business in regions where economic development is critically important but difficult.

lenders.name: chandika
lenders.loan_because: somebody needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a student studying in USA

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I am a strong supporter of trade not aid as a powerful way to alleviate poverty and promote social justice.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs/small business owners and nongovernmental organizations on how to more effectively work together to solve local and global issues.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer

lenders.name: Tenisha

lenders.occupational_info: I help people all over market themselves or their business.  I also help just ordinary people print pictures for everyday use or for scrapbooking.  I put together presentations and I also design just about any thing you could imagine!  I love my job and the creativity that I get to express to so many different people.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government of Canada.

lenders.name: TAMMY

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I give because I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: Love God. Love People.
